sentences.simplifiedText: 我想度过一个美好的假期。
sentences.traditionalText: 我想度過一個美好的假期。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng dùguò yīgè měihǎo de jiàqī.
sentences.translation: I want to spend a wonderful vacation.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然困难重重，我们还是成功度过了这个难关。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然困難重重，我們還是成功度過了這個難關。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán kùnnán chóngchóng, wǒmen háishì chénggōng dùguòle zhège nánguān.
sentences.translation: Despite the difficulties, we managed to get through this difficult time successfully.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我希望我们都能度过这个难关。
sentences.traditionalText: 我希望我們都能度過這個難關。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ xī wàng wǒ men dōu néng dù guò zhè gè nán guān.
sentences.translation: I hope we can all get through this difficult time.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他生活中遇到了许多困难，但他始终都能以乐观的态度度过。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他生活中遇到了許多困難，但他始終都能以樂觀的態度度過。
sentences.pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā shēng huó zhōng yù dào le xǔ duō kùn nán, dàn tā shǐ zhōng dōu néng yǐ lè guān de tài du dù guò.
sentences.translation: Despite the many difficulties he has encountered in his life, he has always been able to get through them with an optimistic attitude.
